name: Robo Run (tedbolt)
description:
Robo Run

Game 10 of 12 in a weekly game challenge

You are Robo and you have a gun, and there are these robots... evil robots. There really really really bad like kill all humans bad. So you are the last of your kind and need to go through the evil robot making factory and destroy all the evil robots. Try and find the spinning golden battery in each level and escape to save the world. Play to be a robot hero!!!!!!!!!!!


CONTROLS:
Left Arrow : Run left
Right Arrow : Run right
Z : Jump
X: Shoot
